title:
Can the Star News TV Listings be re-done to include the local listings for RTV, Bounce, and This TV (the secondary channels of WWAY, WECT, and WSFX)?



The current listings include the secondary channels on UNC TV (Channel 39) but not channels 3, 6, and 26.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=13268
